name: partialVoucherMatchWithNegativeAdditionalLines

testSteps.description: Given that I'm logged in to 'Voucher Match' page

children.description: When i open page from sidebar menu: {Accounts Payable,Voucher Entries,Voucher Match}

testSteps.description: Then the 'Voucher Match' page and its contents should show up
When I set the 'Supplier' to '170713'

exception.message:
Expected condition failed: waiting for visibility of all elements located by By.xpath:  .//div[contains(@class, 'form-item')][span[text()='Supplier']]//div[contains(@class, 'Select-option')] | .//div[contains(@class, 'form-item')][span[contains(text(), 'Supplier')]]//div[contains(@class, 'Select-option')] (tried for 120 second(s) with 100 milliseconds interval)
Build info: version: '3.141.59', revision: 'e82be7d358', time: '2018-11-14T08:17:03'
System info: host: 'PCS15848', ip: '192.168.1.9', os.name: 'Windows 10', os.arch: 'amd64', os.version: '10.0', java.version: '1.8.0_392'
Driver info: net.thucydides.core.webdriver.WebDriverFacade

testSteps.description: When i clear the business unit
When I click the 'Search' button
When I click the 'See More Details' button
When I click the checkbox of the first invoice row
When I click on 'Match' button
Then the 'Payment Information' and its contents should show up
When I set the 'Invoice Number' to 'NMiJhA53NJ'
When I click on 'Continue' button
When I select the first Bank Account and click 'Submit' button if modal exist
When I set the 'Gross Amount' using the remaining amount value plus 100
When I set the Quantity to voucher to '1'
When I set the Amount to voucher to '0'
When i click on validate button if its enabled
When I click on 'Save' button
When I fill up 'Additional Lines' table form Account Number: '937000', Line Description: 'TEST VOUCHER MATCH', Cost Center: '', AOE: 'BAM5000', Line Ref: 'A'
When I click 'Add Line' button
When I fill up the last row line using Account Number: '937000', Line Description: 'TEST VOUCHER MATCH', Amount: '', Cost Center: 'BAM5000', Gen Obj: 'A', AOE: 'YAO', Line Ref: 'TEST'
When I click on 'Save' button
Then the 'Voucher Match Successfully Created' modal should show up
When I click on 'Exit' button from modal
When I open the 'Batch Posting' page
When I set the 'Batch Number' using the previously generated value from Pre registration modal
When i clear the batch type field
When i click on search button
Then the batch posting search results should show up
Then the post button of the first batch posting search result should be disabled
When I click 'See More' button
Then the post button of the first batch posting search result should be enabled
When i click post button
Then the 'Batch Successfully Posted' notification message should show up
Then the 'Reverse Void' button should be enabled
When I click 'Reverse Void' button
Then the 'Void Journal Entry' modal should show up
When I click on modal 'Confirm' button
Then the 'Document Reversed Successfully' notifiaction message should show up
When i click post button
Then the 'Batch Successfully Posted' notification message should show up

title: Partial voucher match with negative additional lines
